content: **crocheted pouch for soap or tawashi in drops paris with lace pattern the piece is worked bottom up ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no w-772 yarn group c ------------------------------------------------------- **size** the bag measures approx width = 12 cm = 4 3/4 length = 13 cm = 5 1/8 **materials** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g color 33 pink **crochet gauge** 18 single crochets in width and 21 row in height = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm = us e/4 hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a smaller hook size
